      height: 2.625rem;
      font-size: 1.125rem; } }

  display: inline-block; }

      display: inline; } }

/* Arrows */
.slick-prev,
.slick-next {
  position: absolute;
  display: block;
  height: 20px;
  width: 20px;
  line-height: 0px;
  font-size: 0px;
  cursor: pointer;
  background: transparent;
  color: transparent;
  top: 50%;

  -ms-transform: translate(0, -50%);
  transform: translate(0, -50%);

  border: none;
  outline: none; }

    outline: none;
    background: transparent;
    color: transparent; }

    .slick-next:hover:before,
    .slick-next:focus:before {
      opacity: 1; }
  .slick-prev.slick-disabled:before,
  .slick-next.slick-disabled:before {
    opacity: 0.35; }
  .slick-prev:before,
  .slick-next:before {
    font-family: "slick";
    font-size: 20px;
    line-height: 1;
    color: white;
    opacity: 0.85;
    -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
    -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale; }

    left: auto;
    right: -25px; }

    content: "←"; }
    [dir="rtl"] .slick-prev:before {
      content: "→"; }

  right: -25px; }

    left: -25px;
    right: auto; }
  .slick-next:before {
    content: "→"; }

      content: "←"; }

    cursor: pointer;
    cursor: hand; }

  -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
  -moz-transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);

  -o-transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
  transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0); }

  position: relative;
  left: 0;
  top: 0;
  display: block;
  margin-left: auto;
  margin-right: auto; }

    content: "";
    display: table; }
  .slick-track:after {
    clear: both; }
  .slick-loading .slick-track {
    visibility: hidden; }

.slick-slide {
  float: left;
  height: 100%;
  min-height: 1px;
  display: none; }
  [dir="rtl"] .slick-slide {
    float: right; }
  .slick-slide img {
    display: block; }
  .slick-slide.slick-loading img {
    display: none; }
  .slick-slide.dragging img {
    pointer-events: none; }
  .slick-initialized .slick-slide {
    display: block; }
  .slick-loading .slick-slide {
    visibility: hidden; }
  .slick-vertical .slick-slide {
    display: block;
    height: auto;
    border: 1px solid transparent; }

.slick-arrow.slick-hidden {
  display: none; }

/*# sourceMappingURL=ttol.css.map */
</flex-basis></flex-shrink></flex-grow></flex-basis></flex-shrink></flex-grow>
